main event: Three field laborers observed a shining object moving at high speed over the sky in Vejle, Denmark on 7 Feb 1948.
interesting points: The object was noted to be at an altitude of approximately 200 meters.,The object was visible for only three seconds.,It moved from southeast to northwest.,The observers were three men working in a nearby field.,The report mentions no verification received for the observations.
sighted object: a shining object in the sky
